title: Drawing, 1969-165-381, 1961
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on heavy white tracing paper
signed: In graphite lower right: A.H. Girard   Feb. 14, 1961
inscribed: In graphite along lower margin: "Bispot"- four times actual size. Verso: in graphite upper left corner: IV - 5
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Pattern of vertical double black dots in horizontal rows.
